content: double distaff for pattern support please contact support@thepassioknitspinner de material size 20 - 25 g of yarn anything between sport and aran weight to fit a wrist circumference up to 17 cm will work knitting needles one size smaller than what you would if you want to increase the size add 1 cm or 1 5 2 cm depending normally use for your yarn on the size wanted to each of the two band parts à 2 to 4 cm tapestry needle total 2 stitch holders instructions band 1 notes cast on 24 stitches i used a long-tail cast on but you can the double distaff is a pattern specifically for spindle spinners you choose your favorite one can use any yarn to create this pattern row 1 *sl1wyif k1* - repeat to end here is what i used repeat row 1 until the piece measures 5 cm version 1 aran weight handspun 14 g 4 mm needles this part is essentially double knitting you will create a double layer version 2 dk weight handspun 15 g 3 25 mm needles of fabric using slightly smaller needles will keep the distaff in better shape and it won´t stretch out as much over time pocket the amount of yarn given in the pattern is more than enough but since it´s an any yarn pattern it´s hard to give exact amounts if you will now divide your stitches like this you have 25 grams you will definitely have more than you´ll need *slip 1 onto a stitch holder with the yarn in the front knit 1* repeat to the end of the row you will have 12 stitches on the needle and 12 stitches a stitch holder © theresia lew 2025 double distaff @schnueffeltier www thepassioknitspinner de 2 band 2 you need to bring your stitches back together for the second half of the band *sl1wyif from the stitch holder knit 1* repeat to the end of the row row 1 *sl1wyif k1* - repeat to end repeat row 1 until the piece measures 5 cm bind off k2tog all stitches while binding them off à k2tog k2tog slip the first knitted stitch over the second knitted stitch they both are on layer 1 your right-hand needle k2tog slip the first knitted stitch over the second knitted stitch - … repeat until there is only one stitch left cut knit in garter stitch knit all stitches until the piece measures 8 cm your yarn and pull it through the last stitch leave 30 cm of yarn since you´ve divided the stitches cut your yarn put all 12 stitches on hanging you´ll need it for seaming the cast on and bind off edges the second stitch holder together layer 2 finishing put the stitches from the first stitch holder back onto the knitting seam the cast on and bind off edges together needles and knit the same as for layer 1 do not cut your yarn weave in ends wash and block ©
